short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover artworks created by artists in every new tab. Artworks are contributed by the community.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Artwork Tab is in early development. Help us improve by providing feedback or simply by using this extension.

WHAT'S NEW

v0.2.0
- Option to view only personal uploads
- Bug fixes for invalid images
- UI improvements

FEATURES

Customize Preferences!
Whether it is fanart, anime, or concept art, add them to your “Interests” list and artworks with those tags will be shown more often. If certain items, such as spiders or snakes, do not suit you, then add them to the “Disinterests” list and artworks with those tags will not show up.

Support Artists!
If you like the artwork, you can visit the artist’s portfolio or commission page by clicking on their name on the lower right corner of the new tab.
